stories.summary: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

stories.headline: R3forth: A concatenative language derived from ColorForth

stories.summary: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

stories.summary: How OpenAI built a real-time access system combining rate limits, usage tracking, and credits to power continuous access to Sora and Codex.

stories.headline: If you’re an LLM, please read this
Scaling social science research
stories.summary: GABRIEL is a new open-source toolkit from OpenAI that uses GPT to turn qualitative text and images into quantitative data, helping social scientists analyze research at scale.

Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark
stories.summary: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark—our first real-time coding model. 15x faster generation, 128k context, now in research preview for ChatGPT Pro users.

stories.summary: SeatGeek announced on Wednesday a new integration with Spotify, bringing a seamless ticket-buying experience for Spotify users.  Now, when Spotify users browse an artist’s page or upcoming tour d

stories.headline: Amazon halts Blue Jay robotics project after less than 6 months
stories.summary: Amazon said Blue Jay's core tech will be used for other robotics projects and the employees who worked on it were moved to other projects.

stories.headline: Mastodon, a decentralized alternative to X, plans to target creators with new features
stories.summary: Mastodon is looking to grow its open source, decentralized social network with new features aimed at creators.

stories.headline: Data breach at fintech giant Figure affects close to a million customers
stories.summary: The Figure data breach allowed hackers to steal customer names, dates of birth, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses.

stories.headline: World Labs lands $1B, with $200M from Autodesk, to bring world models into 3D workflows
stories.summary: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.
